name: Söguheimar
description: Söguheimar is a summer camp founded in 2014. I took over the project 2016 and redesigned the website but continued using Jekyll.

name: Steini art
description: Steini art is a blog and art showcase for Aðalstein Þórsson and his project Einkasafnið. It´s built-in Craft CMS, which is a fantastic CMS.

name: Parser
description: Parser is a command-line tool I developed to convert CSV rows into individual PDFs. These PDFs are then merged into a single document, simplifying printing.
